src\server\model\players\Client.java:1460: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [FIXED]Help with compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

   public void correctCoordinates() {
        if (inPcGame()) {
            getPA().movePlayer(2657, 2639, 0);
        }
        if (inFightCaves()) {
            getPA().movePlayer(absX, absY, playerId * 4);
            sendMessage("Your wave will start in 10 seconds.");
            EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                public void execute(EventContainer c) {
                    Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave((Client) Server.playerHandler.players[playerId]);
                    c.stop();
                }
            });
        }
    }

Fix’t.

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED]Help with compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

So I am working on a new minigame and had deleted something from client java as it really wasn’t needed and I keep getting this error. I have tried adding ) and } where ever it says and it keeps bringing up the same error.

I am hoping somebody can fix this. The below code is the very bottom part of my client.java.

public void correctCoordinates() { if (inPcGame()) { getPA().movePlayer(2657, 2639, 0); } if (inFightCaves()) { getPA().movePlayer(absX, absY, playerId * 4); sendMessage("Your wave will start in 10 seconds."); EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave((Client)Server.playerHandler.players[playerId]); c.stop(); } } } } } }

compiler error:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1458: ')' expected } ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:1461: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

HAS BEEN FIXED THANKS TO THOSE WHO ASSISTED

Read full topic
